question: How many medal did Indian wushu team win at the BRICS Games 2017?
explanation: Indian Wushu Team bags six medals in 2017 BRICS games. The medals comprised two each in gold, silver, and bronze. M. Gyandas and Anjul Namdev won one gold each. The two silver medals won by Bidheswari Devi and Toshibala. L. Sanatgombhi Chanu and Sajan Lama won bronze medal.
